display.title: The Spire
display.description:
The Spire will surprise you: it is a modern urban monument build in 2003. The surprising fact - it's height: 121.2 meters.

Also known as The Monument of Light, it is build so that it's shape would resemble a ray of sun hitting the Earth. What I find interesting about it is that at the base of The Spire there is a time capsule for future generations to find and wonder.
